title: My patch notes 5.3
body: My patch notes 5.3 is in French. I don't know how that happened I'm in North America server weird.. Any way just wanted to let you guys know thank you for your time.

replies.body:
Hey there! 

In the upper right hand corner of the patch notes webite, there's a drop down menu that will allow you to change your language.
Same here. I can change to English in a different region, but when I switch back to North America and English is selected, the patch notes are in French.

Hmm, that's interesting. 

I swapped from EUW, back to North America -> English and I'm not able to reproduce this. D:

EDIT: Okay, I see what you mean now. I thought you were looking at the patch notes on the website, not the client. Yep, it's definitely in French.
Next time I know what client is and your website is I'll differentiate from the 2 thank you again
Yes there is, but my patch notes are still in french regardless of how many times I press the english language button :)

I dont understand why My patch is not even letting me patch. It keeps giving me a error and showing continue or send log. When I send log it just closes and when i hit continue it sits at 33% and everyone once in a while send back the same error
Same i just checked mine is french to....When i read it yesterday it was in English :)
lol, i came here looking to see if it was just me, have the same issue, patchnotes in french.
Yeah, having the same issue here.  Able to translate a bit of it, but still missing out on all of the funny jokes that are usually worked in there D:
I too have French patch notes in the NA region. Language says English and if it's selected it still stays French.
My patch notes are also in french. This is hilarious.
